title: Phone Formats?! Help
content:
Hi all,

I've been working on stationary for an international company for a few weeks. This co. has offices all around and I have been trying to find a definitive place online which has the correct formating for phone numbers globally.

Can anyone direct me to somewhere like that? Does it exists?

Many thanks  
Javier
author: javi2307

comments.content: Maybe the International Telecommunication Union [**Recommendation E.123**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019132037/http:/www.itu.int/rec/T-REC-E.123-200102-I/), _Notation for national and international telephone numbers, e-mail addresses and Web addresses_, can help.
AFAIK, phone numbers pretty much differ in format from country to country.

This thread may be of use (UK specific numbering)

[http://typophile.com/node/31771](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019132037/http:/typophile.com/node/31771 "http://typophile.com/node/31771")
